document.masterDocTitle: Pelagic amphipods (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Hyperiidea) in western Mexico. 3 Family Lestrigonidae

Remarks . Siegel-Causey (1982) reported this species as a common inhabitant in the northern, central and southern Gulf of California . From 0 to 200 m depth (
Vinogradov et al . 1996
, García Madrigal 2007 ).
Gasca et al . (2012)
found it among the most abundant species in the Mexican tropical Pacific area linked to the California Current conditions.
